IsEmail: $t({path}.PROPERTY_MAPPINGS.{property}) must be a valid email address
PhoneFormat: $t({path}.PROPERTY_MAPPINGS.{property}) must be a valid phone number
KuwaitPhoneFormat: $t({path}.PROPERTY_MAPPINGS.{property}) must be a valid Kuwait phone number (+965XXXXXXXX)
IsFirebaseId: $t({path}.PROPERTY_MAPPINGS.{property}) must be a valid Firebase ID
